summary: Completed frontend testing of round broadcast feature. All 5 requested features tested. 4/5 passed initially, 1 required a bug fix (API endpoint mismatch). After fix, all 5 features working correctly.

design_issues.screen: Round Result Dialog / Round Broadcast Dialog
issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` for {DialogContent} - accessibility improvement needed

action_items: Minor: Add aria-describedby to DialogContent components for accessibility compliance
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed bug: fetchRoundForReview was calling /api/unified/events (404) instead of /api/events
RoundWinner component correctly displays round number, scores (red/blue), and winner name
Round broadcast overlay works correctly with proper styling and animations
seed_data_creation: Used existing test bout: test-event-1-fight-1 (John Doe vs Jane Smith, 5 rounds)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Round broadcast feature fully tested and working. Test bout 'test-event-1-fight-1' now has R1 and R2 completed (both 10-10 DRAW), currently on Round 3. All round broadcast and review features working correctly.
passed_tests: TEST 1: Supervisor dashboard loads correctly with fighter names (John Doe vs Jane Smith), round indicator (ROUND 2 of 5), and completed rounds section - PASSED
TEST 2: Round review dialog - Initially failed due to API endpoint mismatch (/api/unified/events returning 404) - FIXED
TEST 3: END ROUND flow - Dialog appears with 'Show Round Result on Arena' button - PASSED
TEST 3: RoundWinner broadcast component displays correctly with round number, scores, and winner - PASSED
TEST 4: Rounds count displays correctly (5 rounds for 5-round bout) - PASSED
TEST 5: Round review dialog opens correctly after fix - PASSED

test_1_dashboard_load.description: Supervisor dashboard loads with correct bout info

test_2_round_review_dialog.description: Round review dialog opens when clicking on completed round
test_2_round_review_dialog.fix_applied: Changed to /api/events which is the correct endpoint

test_3_end_round_flow.description: END ROUND button triggers round result dialog with arena broadcast option
verified: Show Round Result on Arena button
R1 and R2 in completed rounds

bug_fixed.reason: The /api/unified/events endpoint does not exist in the backend. The correct endpoint is /api/events.
